page.title: 20HOME LIFE IN BRAMSHAW AREA
page.content: { TYPES OF HOMES.}Mostly houses or cottages, there being few flats available.Many of the smaller cottages have been enlarged and renovated. {PREPARATION OF FOOD.}cooking may be by electricity, calor gas or Aga/raeburn type stoves which canuse any of the following fuels:-oil, calor gas, solid fuel or wood. Micro wave ovens are popular especially where both parents are working. {DOMESTIC HELP.}Only a few families employ full time domestic help. Some have part time help with cleaning & gardening jobs. Au pair girls are sometimes employed to look after the children. {HOME ENTERTAINMENT.}TV & video are very popular. Indoor games are played & hobbies followed.
